description:
Mishima has developed a new "DNA Changer," but it gets mixed up with an energy drink Akiko brings home from the office. As Ryunosuke is doing homework, he chugs it and turns into an alligator! Chaos erupts as he`s forced to flee the house, and only Nuku Nuku realizes that it`s still him...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Nuku Nuku and Ryunosuke - It was a very alligator day
Nuku Nuku to Ryuunosuke! Tottemo Wani na Yoru Datta
ヌクヌクと龍之介! とってもワニな夜だった
